Text: Gade: \n How did I come to this?
Cyanea: \n I'm having trouble maintaining my form!
Gather the Lost Memories
Welcome back, \n Raven. \n I'm glad you're safe.
Barely, eh? You \n almost got trapped \n in there.
It appears an \n unforeseen \n issue has arisen.
But there's no \n time to worry \n about that now.
Gegh!

Now that you have the 
 elements of Light and 
 Darkness, we can return 
 to the Ark and-
Aah!
They're gone.
It can't be! \n Did you mess \n up somewhere?
Something is \n not right in \n the dream...
Hm?
Hic!
Gack.
Uggh.
This wasn't \n real...
We were tricked.
And the power of \n the Creators was \n just stolen.
Then I'll just \n have to steal it \n back.
I'm not giving up on \n the children!
That's one of my memories.
They're not gonna make it easy for me to grab my memories.
If I want them, I'm going to have to fight for them.
I remember everything.
I'm starting to remember things now...
This is my chance to find my memories.
I've got no choice but to fight.
I have to find my memories if I want to save Zaza.
I was so alone when I came back to Hekseville...
Scrounging from the trash, sleeping in the streets...

Lumino of the Light. 
 Tenebria of the 
 Darkness. What do you 
 want out of all this?
What everyone wants - \n freedom. I will not be \n sealed away again!
I just want those \n disgusting humans to \n leave me alone.
Hmph, guess striking \n a deal is out of the \n question.
If they want to have \n another go, they'll \n get it.
Raven, wait. \n You don't have what \n you need to defeat them.
All of the factors \n aren't in place. There's \n a synchronisation issue.
Synchronisation? \n What does that mean?

Something needs to be 
 reverted to the state it 
 was in before the 
 experiment.
That something is you. \n You're incomplete.
The last of your lost \n memories are here, \n in this town.
Find the rest of your \n memories. Remember \n who you were.
I was so weak. Then Xii appeared...
With Xii, I learned how to shift gravity. I learned to survive.
I left Sachya behind and became Raven.
Defeat Lumino and Tenebria
Lost Memories
I need to find my memories.
Bit: \n Careful, they're not going to make this easy for you.
Bit: \n Find your memories before it's too late.
The light. It must be leading to one of my memories.
Now's my chance to find my memories!

The memories here are 
 the ones from when I 
 left Sachya behind and 
 became Raven.
And after you \n met the other \n Shifter.

You still need to 
 remember. Find 
 the rest of your 
 memories.
I need to hurry and remember who I am.
I heard a voice calling me when I met Xii.
It sounded so much like her.
Even when we first met, it felt like somehow I knew her.
You really think you \n can defeat me?
You just don't have it \n in you to take my \n power from me.
What does she mean!?

You don't yet have 
 the power you need 
 to finish her off. 
 She'll be back again.
Did you think \n you defeated me?
She's back!?
You need to find the \n power to stop them for \n good.
I admire your spirit.
But it'll take more \n than that to stop me.
He's going to just \n keep coming, isn't he?

I'm afraid so. You 
 don't yet have the 
 power you need to 
 finish him off.
Impressive!
But not enough \n to defeat me.
He's back!?

You don't yet 
 have the power 
 you need to 
 stop them.
Where are my \n memories!?
Change of plans. \n Fight back.
How!?

Your memories are 
 somehow connected 
 to the elements of 
 Light and Darkness.
And taking them out \n might help me find \n what I'm missing.
I remember now...

And now you have the 
 power you need to claim 
 the elements of Light 
 and Darkness.
Creator! You won't \n get away with this.

The world can't exist 
 without light and 
 darkness. We won't be 
 so easy to control.
The great and powerful \n Creator, throwing in \n with humans, really...
I'm disappointed in you.
I haven't interfered, \n I've only guided.

Raven, hurry. We need 
 their power to put 
 everything back in its 
 place.
Defeat Lumino and Tenebria
I need to defeat them and put everything back to normal.
I will claim your power!
I'm not giving up.
I'm the only one that can save everyone.
Just a little more...
This time you're not escaping!
Bit: \n They're going to power each other up.
Bit: \n They're getting ready to power each other up again.
Bit: \n You need to stop them before they charge each other up.
Bit: \n Stop them from powering each other up.
No, I let them power up!
This is going to make things tricky.
Great, now they're more powerful than ever.
That stopped them.
Oh no, you're not powering up on me.
That put a stop to them.
Bit: \n They're back to normal. Now's your chance to fight back.
Bit: \n I think they've run out of power, for now.
Bit: \n They've lost their power, you need to go on the attack.
What's this light...?
Bit: \n That light will guide you to your lost memories.
The light's leading to one of my memories.
Now's my chance to find another memory.
The light should lead me where I need to go.
Bit: \n I don't sense any memories here. Try somewhere else.
Bit: \n There don't seem to be any memories around here.
Bit: \n Try looking somewhere else for your memories.
Bit: \n I sense a lost memory around here. You should look around.
Bit: \n There's a lost memory near here, I can feel it.
Bit: \n It would be worth checking here for a lost memory.
I need my lost memories if I want to fight them.
Bit: \n I sense a lost memory that way.
Bit: \n I don't sense any memories down here. You should head up.
